translations: n.[内科] 肠胃气胀；浮夸；自负

phrs.translation: 胃肠胀气因子, 胀气因子

sentences.sentence: "An average person, "Roach explains, "will, during the peak flatulence period, pass anywhere from one to almost three cups of flatus per hour."
sentences.translation: “一个普通人，”罗奇解释道，“在肠胃最胀气的时候，每个小时会放出1到3杯的的屁。

sentences.sentence: The average person releases nearly a pint of intestinal gas by flatulence every day.
sentences.translation: 普通人每天释放约一品脱的肠积气。

sentences.sentence: When gas doesn't pass through belching or flatulence, it can build up in the stomach and intestines and lead to bloating.
sentences.translation: 如果气体不能通过打嗝或排气排出体外，就会聚积在胃肠道，从而引起腹胀。
